      • binSearchNPA

        public abstract long binSearchNPA(long val,
                long startIdx,
                long endIdx,
                boolean flag)
        Binary Search for a value withing NPA.
        Parameters:
        val - Value to be searched.
        startIdx - Starting index into NPA.
        endIdx - Ending index into NPA.
        flag - Whether to search for left or the right boundary.
        Returns:
        Search result as an index into the NPA.
